OOC: Guess what I found out that even though the Netscape browser 
doesn't work on my computer anymore the Microsoft one is still here. 
I'm glad when I decided that 2 browsers was a silly idea I seem to 
have missed this copy.  Also you guys complain that the new 
transformers alters stuff like what the Matrix is and cybertron 
having an organic core.  Well do we listen to that guy who said an 
atom was like "plum pudding" (dang it I'm making myself hungry now).  
NO we listen to the modernday version that has better equipment to 
build on old theories.  Also I think the organic creatures probably 
were brought to Cybertron as a beatification project (and early 
experiments with DNA scanners I know some bot in transformers looked 
like animals but it wasn't convincing just similar and I doubt it 
served the purpose of protecting them from energon), but I...I...I 
AGREE WTIH LN THERE I SAID IT!  NightScream suggested that "some bot 
decided you weren't worth keeping around" (he was talking to the bat 
sceleton he got his DNA from) and I think that after what LN 
suggested happened the Quasacons wiped out the animals, but they had 
already become to much a part of Cybertron to just vanish so there 
souls (don't say they don't exist if sparks exist souls aren't a 
question) took on the form of organic core and took over Vector Sigma 
altering it's nature.  The Matrix by this time had come close enough 
to expanding into heaven and had become so much smarter and universal 
it saw this was for the best and let it be.  It explains why a 
computer so bent on making Cybertron Technorganic had a weapon that 
only worked against organics.  I DID IT!  I DID THE UNTHINKABLE!  I 
LOGICALLY MELDED THE 3 SERIES TOGETHER! Well naturally BW and BM were 
already together, but, I MELDED G1 TO THEM!  NO ONE CAN PENALIZE ME 
FOR THIS OOC BECAUSE IT COULD BE THE MOST INFLUENTIAL THING I EVER 
POSTED (the ONLY OOC I ever posted that actually affected anything 
although I'm sure SOME of my ICs MUST HAVE influenced SOMETHING)!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> My personal theory is that the Transformers tried to become more 
like humans. 
> Remember in G1 during FFoD The quintessons were not too happy about 
the 
> humans helping the autobots because they were starting to act and 
think like 
> them, thus becoming unpredictable, where as the Decepticons were. I 
think 
> maybe in their efforts to become somewhat more human like something 
happened 
> between Cybertron and Earth, something really bad and thus Earth 
was made a 
> restricted area of space for cybertronians. Thats my two cents 
anyway.
